ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of PAUL G. SMITH of Calgary, Alberta, as a director of the Board of Directors of VIA Rail Canada Inc. to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of James J. Smith.
